author: Stuart Rogers
title: On board a Royal Collection cruise
text: APT’s Royal Collection aims to offer the best and most luxurious cruises to its valued customers by using only the finest ships. In fact, the vessels deployed by APT are the only fleet to have received a 4-Star Plus rating in the Berlitz: River Cruising in Europe travel guide, the highest level awarded. Each ship boasts a large outdoor deck with lounge chairs and uninterrupted riverside views, while most feature a heated pool with swim-up bar. The main lounges offer cosy sofas, a fully-stocked bar and panoramic windows and you’ll also find a hair and beauty salon that offers massages, plus a fitness area and library. All spacious cabins are outsidefacing and have external windows and you can choose the type of suite or balcony: Twin Window, French Balcony or the innovative Twin Balcony, which combines both for the ultimate private viewing area. Royal Collection holidays in Europe also include a welcome reception, farewell dinner and complimentary on-board drinks throughout the voyage Dining is a vital ingredient of any holiday. The quality of the included culinary experiences sets APT’s river cruises apart with the only vessels to be inducted into La Chaîne des Rôtisseurs, one of the world’s most prestigious culinary organisations. At the rear of each river ship is the intimate Chef’s Table Restaurant, which offers stunning views as well as a degustation menu prepared by a private chef — all at no extra cost. Royal Collection holidays in Europe also include a welcome reception, farewell dinner and complimentary on-board drinks throughout the voyage. The on-board entertainment — including musical performances, lectures and cooking demonstrations — offers an insight into the customs and traditions of the region through which you’re travelling. You are promised first-class service with one of the highest staff-to-guest ratios, and an onboard cruise director will be on hand to ensure everything runs smoothly. Royal Collection river cruises also include complimentary home-to-airport transfers by private car. Wherever you sail, you will enjoy elegance and comfort throughout your voyage on board your floating boutique hotel. • For more information or to book, call 0800 046 7729 or visit aptouring.co.uk/tele »
